description.value: The crystals used at the core of this upgrade are harvested from a slow-moving, geode-like beast that hunts the dark side of Verces and stuns its prey with flashes of light. You can activate this upgrade as a move action to emit a strobe-like burst of radiance. All creatures other than you within 20 feet must succeed at a Reflex saving throw (DC = 10 + half the upgradeâ€™s item level + your Dexterity modifier) or become blind for 1 round. A set of flashblinders recharges automatically after 1 minute.
